简体中文: 本游戏包含语音聊天功能

English: PLEASE USE HEADPHONES AND A MICROPHONE
简体中文: 请使用耳机与麦克风获取更佳体验

English: Controls remapping is not currently supported.\nYou can use Steam Input to remap gamepads.
简体中文: 目前尚不支持控制按键重设。\n您可使用 Steam Input 对手柄进行重映射。

English: Have a friend escape the island without you.
简体中文: 让一名好友逃离岛屿而不带上你。
从营火处获得 5 次士气提升。

English: Restore 200 total poison by using items.
简体中文: 使用道具恢复总计 200 点中毒值。

English: Eat 5 different berries in a single expedition.
简体中文: 单次探险食用 5 种不同浆果。

English: Escape the island in a solo expedition.
简体中文: 在单人探险中逃离岛屿。

English: Resurrect 3 scouts in a single expedition.
简体中文: 单次探险复活 3 名童子军。

English: Escape the island without taking fall damage.
简体中文: 逃离岛屿且未遭受掉落伤害。

English: Escape the island without placing anything on the mountain.
简体中文: 逃离岛屿且未在山上放置任何东西。

English: Escape the island in under an hour.
Help Bing Bong escape the island.
Escape the island without eating any packaged food.
简体中文: 逃离岛屿且未食用任何包装食品。

English: Escape the island after cooking and eating a coconut half, a honeycomb, a yellow winterberry, and an egg.
简体中文: 逃离岛屿前烹饪并食用半边椰子、蜂巢蜜、黄雪莓、煎蛋。

English: Eat four different non-toxic mushrooms in a single expedition.
简体中文: 单次探险食用四种无毒蘑菇。

English: Heal your friends for 100 points of injury in a single expedition.
简体中文: 单次探险为好友治疗 100 点伤害。

English: Escape the island without ever losing consciousness.
简体中文: 逃离岛屿且未曾失去意识。

English: Play the bugle for a capybara.
Reach the top of a really big tree.
简体中文: 登顶一棵真正够大的树。
和童军领队来个一对一。

English: Place 100m of rope in a single expedition.
简体中文: 单次探险放置 100m 绳索。

English: Heal an unconscious friend with an item to save them from death.
简体中文: 使用道具救治一名昏迷好友助其离死亡。

English: Open 15 luggages in a single expedition.
简体中文: 单次探险开启 15 件行李箱。

English: Read all of Scoutmaster Myres's journal entries.
简体中文: 阅读迈尔斯领队的全部日志条目。

English: Climb 50m upwards without touching the ground.
You don't have this badge yet!

Ready for a greater challenge? Ascents add modifiers that make summiting the PEAK more difficult.

Set your Ascent Level at the Airport Kiosk!
简体中文:
准备好迎接更大的挑战了吗？天阶模式能为你前往顶峰的征途增添更多挑战。

在机场终端设置想要征服的天阶等级吧！

English: CLIMBING TAKES LESS STAMINA. HUNGER GROWS MORE SLOWLY. NO TIME LIMIT.
简体中文: 攀爬消耗体力较少；饥饿速度较慢；无时间限制。

English: THERE ARE NO FLARES ATOP THE PEAK.
can't light campfire with friends missing!
简体中文: 朋友不在时无法点燃营火！

童军领队迈尔斯的
指南手册

English:
Ahh....................................................................................................................................................................... nature.

What greater ecstacy in this life than crunching down on a succulent granola bar while the wind blows across your scalp atop one of this world's many miraculous mountaintops?

But of course, nature is not just some fairground amusement, some attraction we might enjoy leisurely from behind glass! Indeed, nature is as dangerous as it is beautiful. And the view is much better from 10,000 feet up than 6 feet under! (Dead)

In my 40 years as a Scoutmaster, I've accumulated a variety of rules for surviving dangerous wilderness situations that should help you out in the unlikely event one of your scout outings goes horribly wrong. But of course, all of these rules pale in comparison to the guiding rule of all scoutdom...
简体中文:
啊..............................................................................................................................................................................大自然啊。

世间瑰丽，哪有什么风景比得上那些清风拂顶的奇绝山巅？人生在世，哪有什么逍遥比得过那刻登顶高峰的饷宴快活？

当然，俗话说金鳞绝非池中物，大自然也绝非什么搁着屏幕就能赏玩的游乐消遣！事实上，大自然的美丽总是带着几分危险。不过，那份黄土之下的安逸（死翘翘），自然比不过万尺高天之上的壮丽景色！

本人担任童军领队四十年之久，总结了一系列应对野外紧急状况的生存法则。倘若众位的童军探险活动出了差错，希望这些经验能给大家帮上点忙。当然，一切仍要遵循这条至高法则......

English: NEVER ABANDON A FRIEND IN NEED!

First things first: you've gotta get to HIGH GROUND if you wanna be spotted. Nobody ever got rescued off of a mysterious island by loitering around on the beach. So find the nearest peak, and start making your way there.
简体中文: 首要之事：要想被找到，就往高处跑。光在神秘岛屿的海滩上胡乱闲逛可不会帮你获救。所以，找到最近的山峰，然后向那里进发吧。

English: Time is of the essence in the wilderness, so get running towards your destination!
简体中文: 时间是野外生存的重中之重，找准目的地就抓紧时间动起来！

English: See a gap in the trail, or a prickly thorn? Go ahead and JUMP over it!
简体中文: 路上有沟拦着？道上有刺挡着？往前冲跳过去呀！

English: Keep in mind that jumping while sprinting will tire you out quickly! Take a quick rest if you need to - you won't do anyone any favors by passing out on the mountain!
简体中文: 务必牢记冲刺跳跃是很费体力的动作！有需要就赶紧休息一下——可别真在山上昏倒坏菜了！

English:
Obviously, you're not going to make it up a mountain without climbing.

You can climb almost any surface, so long as you have the stamina!
简体中文:
当然，山不爬是上不去的。

不过也请相信自己，只要有体力，什么表面统统都能爬上去！

English:
Nothing is more important than sticking together as a team!

When your hands are empty, reach out to a friend who's mid-climb and help them reach the next ledge safely!
简体中文:
离群孤雁难远行，唯有团队最要紧！

只要手上还有空，抓紧给你攀爬中的朋友拉上一把，帮助他们安全爬到下个岩架！

English: You can help from below, too! Crouch down and let a fellow scout stand on your head, then jump to give them a boost!
简体中文: 就算是在下边也能帮忙！蹲下来让一位童军伙伴站你头上，跳起来给下助力吧！

English:
An effective scout keeps an eye on their Stamina Bar at all times. If it runs out, you'll be temporarily unable to run, jump, and most importantly, climb.

Worst case scenario, you could fall off the mountain to your death, which is the worst thing to fall off to!
简体中文:
优秀的童军总会时刻留意自己的体力条。如果体力耗尽，你将暂时无法奔跑、无法跳跃，当然还有最重要的——无法攀爬。

最糟糕的情况，你可能会直接跌下山去摔死，迎来人生最惨的大起大落！

English:
As you make your way through the untamed wilderness, it's inevitable that you'll get some scratches and bumps.

The more hurt you get, the less Stamina you'll have to run and climb, so tend to your injuries as soon as possible with a bandage or a healing herb!
简体中文:
在这不羁的荒野蹒跚前行，难免会有些磕磕绊绊。

受到的伤害越多，能留给你奔跑攀爬的体力也就越少，因此务必保持重视，一旦有条件就要用绷带或者治疗药草尽快对伤口进行处理！

English:
Getting hurt isn't the only way for your Stamina to go downhill fast. As you climb, you'll find yourself experiencing Hunger, for which 10/10 experts recommend eating food.

Be cautious of eating plants from the wilderness! They could poison you and really mess up your day. If you have the option, choose a packaged snack from a corporation you trust!
简体中文:
并不是只有受伤才会让你的体力飞流直下。如果攀爬时，腹中的饥饿之感逐渐翻涌而来，这就百分百说明你该摄取食物了！

野外的植物吃着要小心！万一有毒就得吃不了兜着走！如果有得选，还是先吃你喜欢的那家牌子的包装零食吧！

English:
Putting a backpack on is a great way to carry additional items, which can make the difference between life and death!

HOWEVER, the more Weight you carry, the less stamina you'll have to climb! An experienced scout knows to pack everything they need... and nothing more!
简体中文:
背上背包当然是携带更多物品的绝佳选择，多一件东西就是多一分生机！

然而，携带的重量越重，能留给你攀爬的体力也会越少！有经验的童子军都知道只装必要的东西......多余的一件不留！

English:
In a survival situation, one of the worst things that can happen is getting separated from the group.

Maintain constant communication whenever possible, and point out your next route in advance to avoid leaving a friend behind!
简体中文:
在野外生存中，最糟糕的情况之一便是掉队。

有条件时务必保持通讯畅通，提前指明你的下一步路线，别让好朋友落在后面！

English:
Exploring the wilderness is a dangerous activity that can kill you instantly - but so is everything in this world worth doing, like falling in love.

Never forget to be a good steward towards our beautiful world, and once again, never forget:
简体中文:
探索荒野是一项危险的运动，分分钟就能要了你命——不过毕竟这就是世界运转的本源逻辑所在，比如陷入爱情。

面对我们美丽的世界，不要忘了务必满怀敬畏之心，当然，更不要忘了：

English:
Dear Diary, bad news!!!

The ship captain made an oopsy, and we've wound up crashed on this mysterious island! Thankfully, mysterious islands are my specialty.

With our whole troop working together, we'll reach the top of the PEAK and signal for help in no time!

In the meantime, I'll take this opportunity to add some additional pages to my famous guidebook.

-Scoutmaster Myres
简体中文:
亲爱的日记，大事不好！！！

船长居然真的搞砸了，咱们现在真在这座神秘的岛上搁浅了！不过谢天谢地，这种神秘岛屿刚好是我的专长所在。

只要我们同心协力，我们一定能登上顶峰，马上就能发出求救信号！

于此同时，我也有了机会能给这部伟大的指南手册增色几页新的篇章。

——童军领队迈尔斯

English:
Mushrooms can be a valuable source of nutrition in the wilderness. But watch out!! Some of them can kill you, or even make you poop your pants.

There's always a way to tell the poisonous ones apart, though. Here's just one example!
简体中文:
蘑菇可以作为重要的野外营养来源。但是一定要小心！！有些蘑菇不但能要了你命，甚至能让你拉一裤子进而社会性死亡。

幸好，还是有些办法能把有毒的种类区分出来。来看看下面的样例吧！

English: If you find a nice place to light a campfire, make sure to bring your friends close by first! The fire brings something even better than heat and cooked food... and that's motivation!
简体中文: 如果找到了绝佳的营火设置地点，一定记得把朋友们都聚拢过来！火焰能带来的不仅是温暖还有热饭......更是有那熊熊燃起的决心啊！

English: Wuh woh! One of our scouts stepped on a sea urchin and died!!! I was about to get really sad... but one of the other kids touched a weird statue, and brought their friend back to life!
简体中文: 喔呼！有位童军伙伴踩到了海胆死了！！！我正要开始伤心呢......结果另外有个小孩碰了什么奇怪的雕像，居然把那小伙伴的命捞了回来！

English: Seems like this island bends the rules of mortality itself... how wacky! Perhaps something else interesting might happen if we use a statue when everyone is still alive...
简体中文: 看来这座岛屿有着自己的一套生死法则......太哈人了！如果大家都还活着的时候就去用一下那种雕像，说不定会发生什么更有趣的事情......

English: As we approach the PEAK, the temperature has begun dropping dramatically. Seeking constant cover is a must, and getting caught out in the open when the wind is strong can be a death sentence.
简体中文: 当我们接近顶峰，气温也就开始急剧下降。持续暴露在这种强风之中可能会害死性命，一定要找到稳定的遮蔽处才行。

English: If all else fails, huddling with your friends to share body heat might just save you from an icy grave.
简体中文: 如果实在没有别的办法，和身边的朋友们相拥取暖吧，这可能是你们避开死神冰爪的最后机会。

English:
I saw such a pretty sight... a beautiful moon-shaped fruit, surrounded by fireflies...

I feel so relaxed now... maybe a nap wouldn't be so bad...
简体中文:
好漂亮的东西......居然还有月亮形状的水果，周围好多萤火虫......

感觉好安逸哦......睡一觉应该没事吧......

English:
I had such a wonderful nap, but when I woke up the rest of the troop was gone!

I'm sure they're just around the corner. They wouldn't be so foolish as to break Rule 0 just because I needed a little lie-down!
简体中文:
我好不容易睡个好觉，醒来一看却发现大部队竟然不见了！

我敢肯定他们没走远呢。哪有人会因为咱浅浅躺了一会儿就破了 0 号守则呀！
0 号守则 0 号守则 0 号守则

English: Never Abandon a Friend in Need!

We made it!!

Even without our scoutmaster's help, we managed to get rescued!

SněžnýPerník managed to make it up first.
Zedorfska made it out without a scratch.
CaptainBear was injured but in great spirits.
Squdel & Kirpich are a little bruised. Good thing they had each other!
Ronokopl kept the team fed and safe.

Mr. Myres, if you're reading this... We couldn't find you!! I'm sorry!
简体中文:
我们成功了！

即便没有领队的帮助，我们竟然还是获救了！

施涅佩克首先抵达。泽多茨卡则是毫发无损。
大熊队长受了点伤不过精神不错。
斯库德和吉尔皮有点浮肿，好在他们能相互支持！
是罗诺普一直在为大家保障食物和安全。


迈尔斯老师，如果您能看到这条的话……我们实在找不到你！！抱歉了！

English: Failed to connect to Photon Network
简体中文: 未能连接至 Photon 网络

English: Try to connect again or play in offline mode?
简体中文: 尝试重连或以离线模式游玩？

English: Host has different game version: [#] while you have [&].
简体中文: 主机的游戏版本为：[#]，你的版本是 [&]。

English: This invite might be out of date.
Close the game, and update the game on steam...
简体中文: 请关闭游戏并通过 Steam 更新版本...
无法找到 Photon 房间
你与 Photon 断开了连接，原因：#

English: This setting can only be adjusted on the main menu.
简体中文: 该设置只能在主菜单更改。

English: Catch a Flying Disc from 100m away.
Climb past the MESA without ever having more than 10% Heat.
简体中文: 在全程热量未超过 10% 的情况下爬过方山。

English: Have a lot of cactuses stuck to you.
Offer The Kiln a worthy sacrifice.
简体中文: 为熔炉献上丰厚的祭品。

English: Shoot across the MESA canyon in a Scout Cannon.
简体中文: 进入童军大炮并将自己射过方山。
在蚁狮的袭击下成功求生。

English: Look a little too closely at the blazing sun.
简体中文: 稍微靠近些观察炽热的太阳。

请按下想要分配给
@ 的键位

English: Climb past the ALPINE without ever having more than 20% Cold.
简体中文: 在全程寒冷值未超过 20% 的情况下爬过雪山。

English: if i say yes, will you take me with you?
简体中文: 我要是说行，你会带我一起吗？

English: i think that's a bad idea...
you should ask your friends for help!
Climb past the ROOTS without ever having more than 25% spores.
简体中文: 在全程孢子值未超过 25% 的情况下爬过森蕈。

English: Escape a spider's web and survive.
简体中文: 从蛛网里逃脱并幸存下来。

English: Cure yourself from a zombie bite.
简体中文: 给自己治愈一次丧尸咬伤。

English: Try all 5 types of Shroomberry in a single expedition.
简体中文: 单次探险吃到全部 5 种菇莓。

English: Pull an unconscious friend 30m with the Rescue Claw.
简体中文: 使用救援抓钩将一位昏迷朋友拖行 30 米。

English: Block 100 total damage with the Fortified Milk.
简体中文: 使用奶白金抵抗总计 100 点伤害。

English: Eat 3 Hot Dogs in 5 seconds or less.
简体中文: 5 秒内吃掉 3 根热狗肠。

English: Ressurect a friend using unholy means.
简体中文: 通过非正经手段复活一位朋友。
从一个蘑菇上弹起 40 米高。
烹饪并吃掉一棵曼德拉草。
